dict.acceptation: （文学、戏剧等）对读者；扔（或踢）到…距离；（马等）具有某种姿势；传得很远；
（枪炮、火箭等的）射程；运输，运送；

sent.orig: They carry children, they carry hardships, they carry burdens but they hold happiness, love and joy.
sent.trans: 她们养育孩子，她们历经苦难，她们承受重担，但她们拥有幸福、爱和欢乐。

sent.orig: You will carry The Church with you; but you have to carry the nobles also.
sent.trans: 你要维护教会，维护就是了；不过你得把贵族也捎带上。

sent.orig: Its passenger vehicles will carry Nissan brand, whereas commercial vehicles mainly carry the Dongfeng brand.
sent.trans: 它的乘用车将采用日产Nissan品牌，而商用车则主要使用东风品牌。

sent.orig: I'll carry you home, I'll carry you home.
sent.trans: 我将带你回家，我将带你回家。

sent.orig: Internal carry-over warehouses refer to those that store exports for internal carry-over.
sent.trans: 国内结转型仓库是指存储用于国内结转的出口货物的仓库。
